reports.queue_and_process_notes: Arrived 5 minutes early to corridor; worker asked who is by origin and called to cabinet A10a; passport checked; 30 minutes for test with instructions to ask if unclear and not to write if unknown.
reports.tips_and_notes: Test is simpler than interview; one month preparation sufficient for standard questions; no grammar check, write legibly enough for inspector to understand; practiced writing answers from reports and online tests.
